price: Ummanni isaas isaan falme [Inni] ni jedhe: "Sila dhugumatti odoo Inni na qajeelchee jiruu isin (waa’ee) Rabbii keessatti na falmituu? Waan isin Isatti qindeessitan hin sodaadhu. Yoo Gooftaan kiyya wahi fedhe malee (homtuu narra hin ga’u) Gooftaan kiyya beekumsa Isaatiin waan hunda waliin ga’eera. Sila hin gorfamtanuu?
arabic: وَحَآجَّهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥۚ قَالَ أَتُحَٰٓجُّوٓنِّي فِي ٱللَّهِ وَقَدۡ هَدَىٰنِۚ وَلَآ أَخَافُ مَا تُشۡرِكُونَ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ رَبِّي شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَسِعَ رَبِّي كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمًاۚ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waḥājjahu qawmuhu qāla atuḥājjūnnī fī al-lahi waqad hadāni walā akhāfu mā tush'rikūna bihi illā an yashāa rabbī shayan wasiʿa rabbī kulla shayin ʿil'man afalā tatadhakkarūna
